name: Moonlight Over Coffee
description:
In some time, in some place, there exists a cafe that serves its customers from 10pm to 6am. On a clear night, the moonlight flows through its windows and the lights in the cafe are dimmed. On nights such as these, the patrons are able to order "Moonlight Over Coffee". In truth, it is no different to regular coffee, yet the customers have been heard to say that it is capable of curing insomnia despite the kick of caffeine that the drink provides.

 And tonight is a full moon.

*Content warnings*

 *Light-hearted discussion of insomnia*

 *One naughty swear word*


*Controls*

 Please press the right key on your keyboard to advance the story.


 If the music doesn't immediately play, please try clicking on the game play window.

 Thank you.<3

*Credits*
 

 Art, music and writing by Haze with the exception of 'A moon in my coffee' image originally by fdecomite on flickr.

     Made in Bitsy 7.2 by ledoux

Room generator from image by ruin

Bitsy room audio mod by candle
